name: Animal Sounds
description:
Animal Sounds Simon-like game where players must listen carefully to the order in which the animal sounds are made.

This project was created for Trijam #167.  Trijam is a weekly game jam where the goal is to create a game in under 3 hours of development time.

Third Party Assets
